sentences.en: Free exchange of goods was advantageous to all.
sentences.cn: 自由商品交易对大家都有利。

sentences.en: A free trade agreement would be advantageous to both countries.
sentences.cn: 自由贸易协定对两国都会有利。

sentences.en: Meteorite impacts can be advantageous for some species, which thrive, and disastrous for other species, which become extinct.
sentences.cn: 陨石的撞击对某些物种是有利的，它们会茁壮成长；而对其他物种则是灾难性的，它们会灭绝。
